articles.content: One of the world's top tobacco manufacturers, British American Tobacco claims to have developed a potential COVID-19 vaccine and that the drug is ready for human trials. As per reports, the company has been conducting pre-clinical trials and claims the potent… [+2451 chars]

articles.title: Cruise ship coronavirus outbreaks have forced the industry to make drastic changes - ABC News
articles.description: Cruise ships are linked to hundreds of cases of coronavirus, but some Australians are still keen to get back on board as soon as possible. How will that be made safe?
articles.content:
Cruise ships have been linked to hundreds of cases of coronavirus across the country, but some Australians are keen to get back on board as soon as possible. Key points:
  • Temperature checks and fewer passengers could be part of the changes

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Why a positive Covid-19 antibody test doesn't mean much of anything yet - CNN
articles.description: Covid-19 antibody tests can tell you if you have had a previous infection, but with varying degrees of accuracy. Here's what you need to know about Covid-19 antibody tests.
